adrFormatAddress: 330 W Broadway, New York, NY 10013, USA

editorialSummary.text: Contemporary outfit specializing in bespoke menswear & accessories made using 3D modeling.

originalText.text: I first went to Acustom about 2 years ago after struggling to find a suit that fit me properly (I have a slim frame with mild scoliosis making it more challenging). Going to Alex exceeded my expectations, he delivered a suit and accompanying shirts with exceptional fit and quality. Since, I have repeatedly gone back to Alex for all my suiting/shirting needs. I recommend anyone looking to elevate the fit and quality of their wardrobe go to Alex and the team at Acustom.

originalText.text:
Outstanding Tailoring by ACustom Apparel!
ACustom Apparel in New York went above and beyond to create a stunning custom suit for my boyfriend, just in time for a wedding. Their team showcased exceptional skill and attention to detail, ensuring a perfect fit and top-quality craftsmanship. We are incredibly grateful for their dedication and quick turnaround, and we highly recommend their services for anyone in need of exceptional tailoring. Thank you, ACustom Apparel, for an amazing experience!

text.text:

originalText.text: My experience at Acustom Apparel was incredible. Alex couldn’t have been more attentive and accommodating. It was wonderful to talk through my preferences for my wedding suit while learning a lot from Alex about style, material, and the process of making the fine suit I bought. I highly recommend this business for anyone in the market for clothes that turn any occasion into a special one. Look no further than Acustom Apparel!

text.text: My experience at Acustom Apparel was incredible. Alex couldn’t have been more attentive and accommodating. It was wonderful to talk through my preferences for my wedding suit while learning a lot from Alex about style, material, and the process of making the fine suit I bought. I highly recommend this business for anyone in the market for clothes that turn any occasion into a special one. Look no further than Acustom Apparel!

originalText.text:
Since first going to Alex and the Acustom team about 4 years ago, my experience of buying suits/formalwear has been nothing but first class.
What sets Alex apart is that he serves his clients as a fashion consultant, and works with you over time to 'build a wardrobe'. He knows exactly what you have, what you like to wear, and what you should be adding to the repertoire.
From the quality of the product, the overall in-store fitting experience, and the promptness of delivery - I cannot recommend this business enough.

originalText.text: I went to Acustom for my wedding tuxedo - 10/10 would do it again. Alex + team were phenomenal throughout the whole process, offering valuable guidance and feedback without any of the pressure of "upselling" that sometimes comes with similar establishments. I've since gone back to round out other parts of my wardrobe, including alterations. Consistently excellent service.
